duties_responsibilities.duty: Drive sales and ensure a consistent customer experience in the retail store environment.
Train associates about store assortment, inventory, and provide a seamless Omni shopping experience.
Resolve customer service issues quickly and efficiently, and support store management with coordination of daily store operations.
Maintain visual and merchandising presentation standards to ensure a seamless customer experience.
Train new associates, lead floor replenishment, and tailor standards to store needs.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED equivalent (Experience in retail preferred)
